pages.title: Kamen Rider Amazon Omega
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Amazons Season 1 (2016, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:amazons/devices/amazons_driver_omega)Amazons Driver (Omega)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch IV$(li)Speed II$(li)Regeneration II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength VII (with empty hand)
